verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: We revealed it on the Night of Destiny.
And what can make you know what’s the Night of Destiny?
The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months.
During this night, the angels and the Spirit descend, by their Lord’s permission, with every command.
Peace it is, until the rise of dawn.
